data.title: back to the future
data.desc: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown

data.title: House of the dragon
data.desc: The reign of House Targaryen begins with this prequel to popular HBO series 'Game of Thrones.' Based on George R.R. Martin's 'Fire & Blood,' 'House of the Dragon' is set nearly 200 years before the events of "Game of Thrones," telling the story of the Targaryen civil war with King Viserys

data.title: interstellar
data.desc: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
